title: Ranked is broken
body: I won 8 out of 10 of my placements and got placed in Bronze 5 how does this work exactly? Can someone explain?

replies.body: Keep in mind that placements take your previous rank into account, as well as the ladder shifting downwards on new season starts. It's hard to say exactly what might have happened to place you there, what was your rank last season?
really? Why does your previous rank determine your current rank?
